blogPost.excerpt: Following the previously successful model SK61, EPOMAKER has made some improvements based on real customer feedback. Thus we designed this new AK61/AK61S with a custom Mac layout and functions for Mac users.
blogPost.body: Following the previously successful model SK61, EPOMAKER has made some improvements based on real customer feedback. Thus we designed this new AK61/AK61S with a custom Mac layout and functions for Mac users.
blogPost.title: Epomaker AK61 - A programmable mechanical keyboard with 61 keys
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 在之前成功的SK61型号之后，EPOMAKER根据真实的客户反馈进行了一些改进。因此，我们为Mac用户设计了这款带有自定义Mac布局和功能的新AK61/AK61S。
localize.tagline: 一种61键的可编程机械键盘

localize.description: 在之前成功的SK61型號之後，EPOMAKER根據真實的客戶反饋進行了一些改進。因此，我們爲Mac用戶設計了這款帶有自定義Mac佈局和功能的新AK61/AK61S。
localize.tagline: 一種61鍵的可編程機械鍵盤

previous.excerpt: Spend too much time in Zoom meetings that could be resolved asynchronously? Cut down on your meetings, and spend more time doing deep work with AsyncMeet.
previous.title: Asynchronous Meetings - Make decisions without having meetings

localize.description: 花在Zoom会议上的时间太多，可以异步解决？减少你的会议，用AsyncMeet花更多时间做深度工作。
localize.tagline: 不用开会就能做出决定

localize.description: 花在Zoom會議上的時間太多，可以異步解決？減少你的會議，用AsyncMeet花更多時間做深度工作。
localize.tagline: 不用開會就能做出決定
